import os
import pandas as pd

#ploting
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
%matplotlib inline
import seaborn as sns
sns.set(style="darkgrid")

#plotly
import plotly.express as px

#color
from colorama import Fore, Style,Back

#pydicom
import pydicom

plt.style.use("seaborn-notebook")
plt.show()


# Suppress warnings 
import warnings
warnings.filterwarnings('ignore')

sns.set(font_scale=1.1)

fig.update_layout(
    autosize=False,
    width=1200,
    height=700,)
fig.show()

source.290441a6: # 7. Comparing the all the data based on sex   [👆Back](#home)
source.c248f80b:
Key Take aways

1. Age ranges from 60 to 75 with FVC from 1500 to 3000

2. People have an average of 9 visits

3. Most people are in the age range from 65 to 75

4. The number of male out range female

5. In both the gender, the number of current smokers is less than never smokers

6. Most male smokers are aged between 65 and 70

7. There exists a good correlation between the FVC value and Percent
